titles.title: Commending the University of Nebraska-Lincoln volleyball team for winning the NCAA Division I Women's Volleyball Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Mrs. Davis (CA) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 99.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/7/2007--Passed House amended. Commends the University of Nebraska-Lincoln Husker volleyball team for winning the 2006 National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I Women's Volleyball National Championship.
